content: What is the standard way of implementing a comma-separated list of values for OR conditions in the search parameters? How do you encode comma not as a separator but part of the value string?
there's a special escape for this: http://build.fhir.org/search.html#escaping

thanks for your quick reply. everything is clear to me now.
